verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician מַשְׂכִּ֥יל <S%H4905><s%> Maschil לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> [A Psalm] of David בְּב֤וֹא ׀ <S%H935><s%> came דּוֹאֵ֣ג <S%H1673><s%> when Doeg הָאֲדֹמִי֮ <S%H130><s%> the Edomite וַיַּגֵּ֪ד <S%H5046><s%> and told לְשָׁ֫א֥וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said ל֑וֹ בָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> is come דָ֝וִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> unto him David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> to the house אֲחִימֶֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H288><s%> of Ahimelech מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> Why תִּתְהַלֵּ֣ל <S%H1984><s%> Why boastest בְּ֭רָעָה <S%H7451><s%> thou thyself in mischief הַגִּבּ֑וֹר <S%H1368><s%> O mighty חֶ֥סֶד <S%H2617><s%> man? the goodness אֵ֝֗ל <S%H410><s%> of God כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> [endureth] continually

הַ֭וּוֹת <S%H1942><s%> mischiefs תַּחְשֹׁ֣ב <S%H2803><s%> deviseth לְשׁוֹנֶ֑ךָ <S%H3956><s%> Thy tongue כְּתַ֥עַר <S%H8593><s%> razor מְ֝לֻטָּ֗שׁ <S%H3913><s%> like a sharp עֹשֵׂ֥ה <S%H6213><s%> working רְמִיָּֽה׃ <S%H7423><s%> deceitfully

אָהַ֣בְתָּ <S%H157><s%> Thou lovest רָּ֣ע <S%H7451><s%> evil מִטּ֑וֹב <S%H2896><s%> more than good שֶׁ֓קֶר ׀ <S%H8267><s%> [and] lying מִדַּבֵּ֖ר <S%H1696><s%> rather than to speak צֶ֣דֶק <S%H6664><s%> righteousness סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah
אָהַ֥בְתָּ <S%H157><s%> Thou lovest כָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> all דִּבְרֵי־ <S%H1697><s%> words בָ֗לַע <S%H1105><s%> all devouring לְשׁ֣וֹן <S%H3956><s%> tongue מִרְמָֽה׃ <S%H4820><s%> O [thou] deceitful

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> But אֵל֮ <S%H410><s%> God יִתָּצְךָ֪ <S%H5422><s%> shall likewise destroy לָ֫נֶ֥צַח <S%H5331><s%> thee for ever יַחְתְּךָ֣ <S%H2846><s%> he shall take thee away וְיִסָּחֲךָ֣ <S%H5255><s%> and pluck thee out מֵאֹ֑הֶל <S%H168><s%> of [thy] dwelling place וְשֵֽׁרֶשְׁךָ֨ <S%H8327><s%> and root thee out מֵאֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the land חַיִּ֣ים <S%H2416><s%> of the living סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah
וְיִרְא֖וּ <S%H7200><s%> also shall see צַדִּיקִ֥ים <S%H6662><s%> The righteous וְיִירָ֗אוּ <S%H3372><s%> and fear וְעָלָ֥יו <S%H5921><s%> and יִשְׂחָֽקוּ׃ <S%H7832><s%> and shall laugh

הִנֵּ֤ה <S%H2009><s%> Behold הַגֶּ֗בֶר <S%H1397><s%> Lo [this is] the man לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not יָשִׂ֥ים <S%H7760><s%> [that] made אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> not God מָֽע֫וּזּ֥וֹ <S%H4581><s%> his strength וַ֭יִּבְטַח <S%H982><s%> but trusted בְּרֹ֣ב <S%H7230><s%> in the abundance עָשְׁר֑וֹ <S%H6239><s%> of his riches יָ֝עֹ֗ז <S%H5810><s%> [and] strengthened בְּהַוָּתֽוֹ׃ <S%H1942><s%> himself in his wickedness

וַאֲנִ֤י ׀ <S%H589><s%> I כְּזַ֣יִת <S%H2132><s%> olive tree רַ֭עֲנָן <S%H7488><s%> But I [am] like a green בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> of God בָּטַ֥חְתִּי <S%H982><s%> I trust בְחֶֽסֶד־ <S%H2617><s%> in the mercy אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> of God עוֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever וָעֶֽד׃ <S%H5703><s%> and ever

אוֹדְךָ֣ <S%H3034><s%> I will praise לְ֭עוֹלָם <S%H5769><s%> thee for ever כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> because עָשִׂ֑יתָ <S%H6213><s%> because thou hast done וַאֲקַוֶּ֖ה <S%H6960><s%> [it] and I will wait שִׁמְךָ֥ <S%H8034><s%> on thy name כִֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because ט֝֗וֹב <S%H2896><s%> for [it is] good נֶ֣גֶד <S%H5048><s%> the presence חֲסִידֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H2623><s%> before thy saints
